faqs.q: How many calories in one rice crispy square?
faqs.a: Approximately 140 kcal for a standard 40 g square.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in rice crispy squares?
faqs.a: About 28 g carbs per square, with 12 g sugars and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: How much fat is in rice crispy squares?
